title: Forecast Janna Joke Bug
body: While playing Janna with the Forecast Janna skin equipped I noticed that while doing the joke emote it would play the audio for classic Janna's skin and Forecast Janna's skin at the same time. I hope this gets fixed soon! :)

replies.body:
Hey ChefBubbleDuck - 

Thanks for the report! This should be resolved in 6.9. We are still working on audio theft if there is another Janna on the enemy team, but if you only have Forecast Janna in a game, it's fixed! :)

Noticed this as well.

Bump for clear skies and bloodshed!
